name: SUBordinary
description:
Everyday... I ride this subway in circles,  asking myself "what will happen if I get out?"

Follow Ruben into the depths of the subway station, which seems to differ from what is ordinary in this  atmospheric low-poly horror game.

Inspired by many games from the early 2010s, explore a huge area, overcome obstacles and witness what may come upon you!

Will you be able to open the gate to the outside or will you stay in the loop?

Triggerwarnings:

  • Trypophobia

(Phobia of small holes)

  •  Achluphobia 

(Phobia of the dark)

  • Flickering Lights Warning.

Credits:

Created using assets from ambientCG.com (CC0).

Sound Assets provided by https://www.weloveindies.com/

huge thanks to them!
